scripts.deploy: ng build --configuration=production && move "C:\Users\diepm\Desktop\git\Debt-Management\DebtManagementUI\dist\DebtManagementUI\browser" "C:\Users\diepm\Desktop\git\Debt-Management\DebtManagement\src\main\resources" && rmdir /s /q "C:\Users\diepm\Desktop\git\Debt-Management\DebtManagement\src\main\resources\static" && ren "C:\Users\diepm\Desktop\git\Debt-Management\DebtManagement\src\main\resources\browser" "static" && copy "C:\Users\diepm\Desktop\git\Debt-Management\DebtManagement\src\main\resources\static\index.html" "C:\Users\diepm\Desktop\git\Debt-Management\DebtManagement\src\main\resources\static\404.html"
